The Battles of Belonia Bulge () were a series of military engagements between guerrillas of the Mukti Bahini which received support from the Indian Army against the Pakistani forces during the Bangladesh War of Independence.
History
In 1971, heavy battles were reported from Feni to Belonia, India with the Mukti Bahini, Indian forces and the Pakistan army.
See also
* Battle of Kamalpur
* List of sectors in the Bangladesh Liberation War
* Battle of Kushtia
* Battle of Shiromoni
* Operation Jackpot
* East Pakistan Air Operations (1971)
* Battle of Gazipur
